name: Fraug, Mighty Prince
description:
Fraug has been banished from his homeroom and now has to travel all the way back to reach his father. The King of Pipedom.

As Fraug goes along there are many enemies. Fortunately, Fraug has a super power. He has the ability to change into any enemy he comes in contact with. Go Get 'em Fraug!

WASD to move and jump.
Right Click signs to read them.
R to Restart
Q/N to toggle music

Changes coming soon... 

(Be aware this is the touch-up version of a game created for gm(48) a 48 hour game-making competition using Gamemaker Studio 2)
